about_the_game:
Desert Kingdoms is a simple medieval real-time strategy game in pixel art.

You will develop your villages, and conquer enemy kingdoms in procedurally generated skirmish maps.

Similar games to Desert Kingdoms: Eufloria and Mushroom Wars.

Features:

* Procedurally generated map which is different every time
* Different unit types with strengths and weaknesses
* Develop villages with different buildings
* Intense skirmishes

Not included:

* Save system
* Campaign
